description_txt: stated on April 4, 2012 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: Says Ellen Rosenblum "has said over and over again that this is a job where 80 percent of the job is being the government’s lawyer."

description_txt: stated on April 17, 2012 in a TV ad.:
quote_txt: Says Ted Cruz represents a Chinese company found guilty of stealing blueprints from an American manufacturer.

description_txt: stated on March 27, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Gas prices have doubled because "Obama opposed exploring for energy in Alaska. He gave millions of tax dollars to Solyndra, which then went bankrupt. And he blocked the Keystone pipeline. So we will all pay more at the pump."

description_txt: stated on March 23, 2012 in a campaign speech:
quote_txt: Every time the price of gasoline rises 1 cent, "it's a billion dollars out of our economy that goes to Saudi Arabia."

description_txt: stated on March 20, 2012 in an op-ed published in The Hill.:
quote_txt: "Congress as a whole is less popular than it’s been since polling was invented."

description_txt: stated on April 11, 2012 in an interview on NJToday:
quote_txt: "The (ARC Tunnel) project was originally estimated to be $8.7 billion, and New Jersey alone was on the hook for all overruns."

description_txt: stated on March 21, 2012 in a chain email:
quote_txt: "The ACLU has filed a suit to end prayer from the military completely."

description_txt: stated on March 26, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: "Large phone companies and their trade association have hired 35 registered lobbyists to influence and pass SB 271 (deregulation legislation)."

description_txt: stated on April 11, 2012 in written testimony at a House hearing:
quote_txt: "Only 14 percent of Catholics agree with the Vatican's position that abortion should be illegal."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • April 19, 2012

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2012 in a speech at Port of Tampa:
quote_txt: "We've brought trade cases against China at nearly twice the rate as the last administration."

description_txt: stated on March 28, 2012 in a web video:
quote_txt: George Allen "voted for 40,000 earmarks."

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2012 in a letter to members:
quote_txt: In labor negotiations with city employees, Milwaukee Mayor Tom Barrett "demanded concessions that went beyond those mandated" by Gov. Scott Walker’s collective bargaining law

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2012:
quote_txt: A proposed regional transportation tax will last "a minimum" of 10 years, and has been approved to last longer.

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2012 in comments to Reuters:
quote_txt: "We are at a 40-year low in our crime rate in our state."

description_txt: stated on March 12, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt: Says his Texas election fraud investigations have resulted in 50 convictions.

description_txt: stated on March 13, 2012 in a letter to the editor:
quote_txt: Says President Obama's decision to not issue a permit for the Keystone XL pipeline meant "we were denied the ability immediately to reduce prices at the pump."

description_txt: stated on April 11, 2012 in a campaign mailer.:
quote_txt: "The non-partisan Congressional Budget Office concluded ObamaCare will cost the U.S. more than 800,000 jobs."

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2012 in a news release.:
quote_txt: "Rhode Island’s exports have increased by 53 percent in the last two years."

description_txt: stated on April 14, 2012 in a speech to a national meeting of the National Rifle Association:
quote_txt: "By the time I finish this speech, two Americans will be slain, six women will be raped, 27 of us will be robbed, and 50 more will be beaten."

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2012 in a Republican US Senate debate at WFAA-TV, Channel 8, in Dallas.:
quote_txt: Says opponent Ted Cruz has not led businesses.

description_txt: stated on April 1, 2012 in an interview on "Face the Nation":
quote_txt: "The bulk of the people who are shot with a weapon — other than these drug gangs taking on one another — end up being shot with their own weapon."

description_txt: stated on April 8, 2012 in n opinion column in the Gloucester County Times:
quote_txt: "While the country’s economy was battered, nine states with no income tax actually grew jobs from 2001 to 2010."

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: The U.S. Supreme Court has not traditionally asked a lot of questions during oral arguments.

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says his sons were "targeted" on Facebook "by out-of-state protesters."

description_txt: stated on March 30, 2012 in a post on Facebook:
quote_txt: "In April 1997, there was a ‘gas out’ conducted nationwide in protest of gas prices. Gasoline prices dropped 30 cents a gallon overnight."

description_txt: stated on March 22, 2012 in a press release.:
quote_txt: "This rule could prevent children under 18 from using such tools as a power screwdriver, a milking machine or something as simple as a wheelbarrow on the family farm . . . "

description_txt: stated on April 3, 2012 in a press conference:
quote_txt: Georgia is one of three states that "effectively have no regulations whatsoever on lobbyists giving to legislators."

description_txt: stated on April 11, 2012 in a campaign event.:
quote_txt: The "Buffett rule" "raises virtually no money, maybe a day and a half of our borrowing per year."

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2012 in a speech in Exeter, N.H.:
quote_txt: The 30 percent tax rate called for under President Barack Obama’s proposed Buffett Rule "is lower than the prescribed tax rate for millionaires already -- not just for millionaires, for people making over $200,000."

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2012 in his congressional website:
quote_txt: Says the Pentagon has never passed a financial audit. In fact,  the Pentagon is exempt from a federal law that requires all federal agencies to complete annual audits.
